title: NLFS: 1912 Olympiska Spelens PC - Jim Thorpe
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: NLFS: 1912 Olympiska Spelens PC - Jim Thorpe
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a gorgeous 1912 Olympiska Spelens "rookie" postcard of one of the greatest athletes of all time, Jim Thorpe, mismatched shoes and all.

[S]$X,XXX[/S] [S]$X,XXX[/S] $X,XXX net to me.  Back of the postcard is clean.

PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1912%20Thorpe.jpg[/IMG]

bump for price reduction. 

Although these were graded a tiny bit higher than the one I'm selling, here are the most recent comps (excluding sales tax, shipping, etc.):

PSA 6 = $5,650.80 on 1/11/25 (Memory Lane)
PSA 5.5 = $4,800 on 11/25/24 (Fanatics Collect)
PSA 5 = $7,932 on 10/26/24 (Goldin)

final price reduction...I just took $500 off the total ($Xk is the price).  Sale ends on Friday, 5/16.

I’m getting crushed on this one, but I already have a lesser condition dupe and could use the funds.

PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url]
